comment: A mysterious ancient civilization that disappeared but left behind extremely powerful technology
And a mysterious force that pervades the Abyss and the surrounding area
just think of it as any human exploitable subject, like in sci-fi most horrible things come from pushing science to an extreme or going to a point beyond natural order
The Abyss kinda is emblematic of that
The deeper you go the further you stray the weirder it gets
Rhings that make sense get horribly skewed
the thing you sought to chase becomes more disrespected and trod upon
Some creatures in the Abyss terrify the ever living *shit* out of me
Like the birds that mimic the cries of the people they've killed
haha yeah it is a very imaginative set of creatures
yeah there are some freaky disturbing things
there are some cute ones tho
like the lil puff hamsters things
Trying to think of other anime you might like...
Well, I have something better than it :D
Quan Zhi Gao Shou (The King's Avatar*
The main plot is that the protagonist is *the* top rated player for an MMORPG.  Basically a super huge celebrity in the country
But ofc, the professional team he was carrying is manned by jealous teammates and a dickbag manager
They pull the old "you're too old for this shit anymore, and so we're replacing you" card

And to be EXTRA dickish, the contract more or less makes his character the team's property.  So when they boot him, he can either keep the character and suffer huge fines that'll ruin him, or give up his legacy to some pos who doesn't deserve it
How can they pull this?  The MMO has a unique pull to it.  When you create a character, that character is connected to a physical card that is scanned to grant you access to the game
Whoever holds the card holds the character
Jokes on them though, he has another character.  It never got far, but it was the character he wanted to improve when he first started playing
So the series will follow his return to glory using his personal character
I'm about to jump on board that boat too
Yeah grabbin some last minute lemon green tea an listenin to some Phil Collins and such~
Okay, ima do my impression of Garou running into Saitama now

its going to be the same till i get it
i don't like to give up
It's wednesday and my family usually goes out to dinner with the grandparents
That got put on hold for a long while because pandemic shutting things down and my mother having to quarantine for 2 weeks after things opened back up due to needed testing before getting an x-ray
I went twice, and my parents just assumed I was going, so my mother got pissy when I asked if I could pass
i feel that. my family used to do that with me
It's like... people seem to forget that the pandemic is an actual thing, and I work at a gas station of all places
I went out twice, and apparently that was teh big mistake, so now it seems like I'm okay with it
the new xkcd was funny about covid avoidance techniques
oh I guess 2nd most recent now
I'm on the chart one, it's actually pretty accurate
Technically, my job would place me as "medium risk"
Low would be people like postal workers.  Essential, but virtually no contact with people.  Not likely to get infected
Extreme would be hospital workers, who are basically guaranteed to be working with infected patients and run an extremely high risk of catching it
High would be medical workers in general outside hospitals.  Not guaranteed to work with infected patients, but elevated chance of contact due to their profession
And then there's lil' ol' me.
yeah some places treat 'essential' designation as being deemed immune haha
Medium = Elevated risk of contact with an infected person, but relatively small chance due to working with the general public
like i have to wear a mask everywhere i go because work asks us to keep each other safe
yeah good practice is good habit
Now that I think about it...
Limit it to once every 3 months :|
Sorry saw this late was playing halo
nothing like a howl among whispy tea vapors on a chilly night
autumn weather is soon gonna creep in
almost midnight here...but i am trying to motivate myself to draw...
...The endless struggle between my ambition and my laziness.
...kinda wanna see Tom draw Halo Raine meet the Chief for Infinite tbh, but I also wanna get my current suggestion through
...what do you think CrRAR? Should I suggest a sequel to 'Halo Raine' soon?
>Chief looks at her reassuringly and nods
*Grunt and other random alien carnage noises**
>Raine just stays standing where she started
:ctwokinds-RaineEep:*[This fight for peace thing is pretty violent]
Red as AI: *cheers on Chief enthusiastically*
I like where this is going
I'm actually trying to draw the third page of a comic with her and some Halo OCs from another person (along with one of my own)
It's...tricky to get the proportions right.
And I'm trying to keep her as close to her original personality as can be
I do want to work her floofyness in though
yeah armor does kinda mangle all hope for judging that
you can kinda tell what body parts should look like and how they fit, but armor is quite synthetic
just draw it comically like floof just bursting at the seams xD
Raine: "I... don't think this is right"
Floof bursting through like pavement weeds~
...I've tried for two years now to figure out where the tail would go.
And there's no way for it to burst out, the Skinsuit's very tough itself...
"We call her  Private Extra Floofy 1st Class"
"or huzzah or harumph or ooorah or whatever"
In my headcanon she's a sniper/CQC person. Grunt birthdays for everyone! Headshots for all!
And a little 'knife to meet you' for unwelcome visitors
Seriously though, it's stuck ever since it was drawn. I have whole storylines bouncing around.
I'm just too lazy and scared to actually make something from them.
I could see a tail having like a special conduit that faces down built into the armor plate
almost like a vauge nose-like shape
That might work... if I figure out a way to justify it in plot
before that she wears the poorly fitting suit
I'm constantly afraid too of what Tom might think of the whole thing
seems like a fun fan spinoff/fiction
I still don't know if he's okay with this sort of thing. Call me stupid, but I am paranoid about something so big...
Then again maybe I should be equally worried about Microsoft suing me for drawing halo stuf...
yeah, may want to get express permission, not sure the ambition of what you're doing
you can probably email to ask?
Weeelll...I did email him...a while ago...but I think it was a bit patronizing and too convoluted
Or maybe I was just being annoying, I don't know
...generally me being annoying is the problem...
You wouldn't believe how many things in life I've screwed up through constant pestering like that.
I feel like if you draw it and just post it to something like DeviantArt in installments with attribution of Raine's character origin in descriptions it's essentially fanart.
I suppose the whole project is fanart...
two OCs and a big boom
Get together with a guest character from a webcomic
And navigate the universe of Halo...
...maybe one of these days I'll actually make it happen.
I think they phased from this plane of existence...
